me.leoko.advancedban.manager

Class PunishmentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.leoko.advancedban.manager.PunishmentManager

  • public class PunishmentManager
extends Object
    The Punishment Manager handles the punishments. It loads and parses them from the database, caches them and eventually discards them again.

    • Constructor Summary

      PunishmentManager()

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public static PunishmentManager get()
        Get the punishment manager.
        Returns:
        the punishment manager instance

      • setup

        public void setup()
        Initially clears out all expired punishments.

      • load

        public InterimData load(String name,
                        String uuid,
                        String ip)
        Get a users punishments as InterimData. This method is meant to be called if the goal eventually is to add the users punishments to the cache. If you are just interested in the specific punishments there are more convenient methods as getBan(String), getMute(String), getWarns(String) or getPunishments(String, PunishmentType, boolean).
        Parameters:
        name - the users name
        uuid - the users uuid
        ip - the users ip
        Returns:
        the interim data

      • discard

        public void discard(String name)
        Discard a players punishments from the cache.
        Parameters:
        name - the name

      • getPunishments

        public List<Punishment> getPunishments(String target,
                                       PunishmentType put,
                                       boolean current)
        Get all punishments which belong to the given uuid or ip.
        Parameters:
        target - the uuid or ip to search for
        put - the basic punishment type to search for (PunishmentType.BAN would also include Tempbans). Use null to search for all punishments.
        current - if only active punishments should be included.
        Returns:
        the punishments

      • getPunishments

        public List<Punishment> getPunishments(SQLQuery sqlQuery,
                                       Object... parameters)
        Get parsed punishments from the database queried by the given SQLQuery.
        The parameters work as described in MessageManager.sendMessage(Object, String, boolean, String...).
        Parameters:
        sqlQuery - the sql query
        parameters - the parameters
        Returns:
        the punishments

        public Punishment getPunishment(int id)
        Get an active punishment by id.

        Returns:
        the punishment

      • getBan

        Returns:

      • isCached

        public boolean isCached(String target)
        Check whether the data for the given uuid, ip or username are currently cached.
        Parameters:
        target - the target (uuid, ip or username)
        Returns:
        whether the targets data is cached

      • setCached

        public void setCached(InterimData data)
        Mark the InterimData as cached. This method des not acually cache the data, see InterimData.accept() to do that.
        Parameters:
        data - the data

      • getCalculationLevel

        public int getCalculationLevel(String uuid,
                               String layout)
        Get punishment-time calculation level. This level is represented by the amount a user has been punished using the given time-layout.
        Parameters:
        uuid - the players uuid
        layout - the time-layout name
        Returns:
        the calculation level

      • getCurrentWarns

        public int getCurrentWarns(String uuid)
        Get how many warnings a player has.
        Parameters:
        uuid - the players uuid
        Returns:
        the current warning count

      • getLoadedPunishments

        public Set<Punishment> getLoadedPunishments(boolean checkExpired)
        Get all cached punishments.
        Parameters:
        checkExpired - whether to look for and remove expired punishments
        Returns:
        the cached punishments

        Returns:
